name: Guacamole Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: avocado, small red onion, jalapeño, fresh cilantro, lime juice, kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper
recipeIngredient: ¼ small red onion, finely chopped
½ jalapeño, seeded and finely chopped
recipeInstructionSteps: In a medium bowl, mash the avocados until desired consistency is reached.
Add the onion, jalapeño, cilantro, and lime juice, and season with salt and pepper. Stir to combine.
